findings.title: Missed call to addIndex(_to) will result in token losses by investors
findings.description: In the issue function of token.sol contract, missing a call to addIndex(_to) can cause token losses for investors.

findings.title: Precision Loss During Division
findings.description: Missed addition to _totalSupply or subtraction from balances[this] can cause precision loss during division if not handled appropriately.

findings.title: Dividend Payment Timing Vulnerability
findings.description: Using 'now >= dividends[currentDividendIndex].time' instead of 'now < dividends[currentDividendIndex].time' can cause dividends to be paid too early.

findings.title: Array Index Out-of-Bounds
findings.description: The condition 'if (amount >= bonuses[i] && (amount < bonuses[i + 1] || i == bonuses.length - 1))' may cause an out-of-bounds error when 'i' equals 'bonuses.length - 1'. It should be rewritten as 'if (amount >= bonuses[i] && (i == bonuses.length - 1 || amount < bonuses[i + 1]))' to avoid this issue.

findings.title: Unintended Dividend Distribution
findings.description: If 'now()' is in period 'k + 2', and calculateDividends for period 'k + 1' is missed, new accounts created in 'k+2' will receive dividends for 'k+1', potentially resulting in extra profit for the investor.

findings.title: Inconsistent Balance Calculation
findings.description: The balanceOf function does not utilize agingBalanceOf[_address][0], which may lead to inaccurate balance calculations.

findings.title: Incorrect AgingTime Sent by Owner
findings.description: If the owner sends a wrong AgingTime that is shorter than the last one, it will make the contract stuck.

findings.title: This function is missed in token.sol
findings.description: The audit report does not provide a detailed description of this finding.

findings.title: Inconsistent Use of pricePerTokenInWei
findings.description: The usage of pricePerTokenInWei may lead to unexpected behavior due to its relatively small value compared to other values.

findings.title: Incorrect Bonus Calculation
findings.description: In both cases, when i=14 and i=15 bonus is the same, price is discounted by 0.925(925)
findings.function: processPayment(address from, uint amount, bool isCustom) internal
